messages.content: You are a structured support ticket generator.
User can't reset password.

Issue: Password Reset
User: Random User
Device: Unknown
Summary: The user cannot reset their password using the email recovery link.
You are a structured support ticket generator.
User can't login to the mobile app.

Issue: Mobile Login Failure
User: Anonymous User
Device: Mobile App
Summary: The user is unable to log into their account through the mobile application.

Customer reporting slow website performance.

Issue: Website Performance
User: Customer
Device: Web Browser
Summary: The customer reports that the website is loading slowly, affecting their ability to browse products.
You are a structured support ticket generator.
User needs to change their email address.

Issue: Email Change Request
User: Existing User
Device: Unknown
Summary: The user has requested assistance in changing their registered email address on their account.
You are a structured support ticket generator.

Issue: Account Access Post-Reset
User: Locked User
Device: Unknown
Summary: After completing a password reset procedure, the customer is unable to access their account with the new credentials.
You are a structured support ticket generator.

User: Recent Customer

User: Dissatisfied Customer

Summary: The customer received a damaged product and is requesting a full refund of their purchase.

Issue: 2FA Failure
